attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the government's obvious disinterest in what the public say - the very people who voted them in to act on their behalf - I think its called democracy - it seems only reasonable to expect that we are not wasting our time and effort, and more importantly being offered an opportunity that is actually a sham - you know making us all feel we are valued and have a say! - in signing petitions.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
